dmca.title: DMCA Violation Notice for f-x-c.net]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 2004 3:40 PM
To: gpoletes@theplanet.com
Cc: jestes@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: DMCA Violation Notice for f-x-c.net]

Please advise us on how to proceed with this issue. The complainant is 
our customer FurNation Multimedia (C2345), lodged against another 
customer, 100Mbit (C13006), who may be a reseller.
-- 
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: DMCA Violation Notice for f-x-c.net
Date: Tue, 17 Aug 2004 12:20:41 -0500
From: <Webmaster@FurNation.com>
Reply-To: <Webmaster@FurNation.com>
Organization: FurNation Multimedia
To: <copyright@theplanet.com>
CC: <abuse@theplanet.com>,        <jestes@theplanet.com>

August 15, 2004

This notice is being sent to copyright@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com,
and a copy is being sent to Rabbit Valley Publishing at
cadel@rabbitvalley.com.

This is formal notification that your service is being used to violate
copyright law under the DMCA provision Section 202.

The following information should help you to identify/remove or terminate
the service of the individual(s) violating copyright of our protected work.
We request that the individual's website be terminated and the individual(s)
banned from your service.

I am writing this letter to you in regards to the following website address:

http://www.f-x-c.net

This website is located at the following IP address, which is hosted within
your system at The Planet:

67.18.219.130

OrgName:     ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
OrgID:          TPCM
Address:       1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Address:       Suite 110
City:             Dallas
StateProv:    TX
PostalCode:  75207
Country:       US

This website is designed to be a paid-subscription service using the Bit
Torrent system to distribute copyrighted and stolen content.  The magazines
and publications we produce are being distributed with this system (a list
of the actual files will be displayed below).  Content from other companies
and producers of copyrighted works are also being distributed using this
system, one of which is Rabbit Valley Publishing (we do not represent this
company, but we have notified them of this infringement).

We request that you disable this website.  Also, we ask that you retain any
information related to the owner/operator of this website pending possible
litigation we are seeking at this time.

Information regarding the DMCA violations and Formal Notification letter
follow.

DMCA TITLE II-ONLINE COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT, SEC. 202 ELEMENTS OF
NOTIFICATION

----------

>>> (I) A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

The electronic signature provided with this email constitutes legal
electronic signing of a digital document.

----------

>>> (II) Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been
infringed, or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are
covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works at
that site.

The RapLab Video, produced by FurNation Multimedia.  DVD format.

The FurNation Anthology Magazine Issue #5.  Magazine Format.

The FurNation Anthology Magazines Issues #1 to #4.  Magazine Format.

None of the above publications were ever made into digital format for
transmission on the Internet.  All the infringed works have been scanned or
ripped into their present digital formats for transmission without our
consent.

----------

>>> (III) Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or
to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access
to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit
the service provider to locate the material.

To get direct access to these files you will need to log into the system.  I
am providing you our own access Username and Password, which we would
appreciate that you keep confidential as we use this access point to verify
what files are being distributed:

Username:  Gideon
Password:  Gideon123

FORUM SUB-MENU:  Forums > Furry Bittorrents > Video > Raplab 4 [DVD-Rip]

FILE NAME:  [fxc] raplab 4.avi.torrent

DIRECT LINK:  http://f-x-c.net/attachment.php?attachmentid=5

-----

FORUM SUB-MENU:  Forums > Furry Bittorrents > Comics > Furnation Issue 5

FILE NAME:  [fxc]Furnation_5.rar.torrent

DIRECT LINK:  http://f-x-c.net/attachment.php?attachmentid=26

-----

FORUM SUB-MENU:  Forums > Furry Bittorrents > Comics > Furnation 1-4

FILE NAME:  [fxc]Furnation1-4Pack.rar.torrent

DIRECT LINK:  http://f-x-c.net/attachment.php?attachmentid=10

----------

>>> (IV) Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to
contact the complaining party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if
available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party may be
contacted.

FurNation Multimedia
6201 Chapel Hill Blvd, Suite 2418
Plano, TX 75093-8886

Phone:  (214) 764-3889
Email:  Webmaster@FurNation.com
Attn:  James A. Robertson

----------

>>> (V) A statement that the complaining party has a good faith belief that
use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I, the legal owner of FurNation Multimedia did not give nor have I ever
given permission for these works to be supplied for distribution on the
Internet.  These files have been converted from their original format, and
have been altered for distribution, which is against our wishes.

----------

>>> (VI) A statement that the information in the notification is accurate,
and under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to
act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly
in-fringed.

I, James A. Robertson certify that the information I have given is accurate
as I can retrieve with the information and technical ability we have
available.

I do not represent Rabbit Valley Publishing, but I am giving notice of
copyright infringement of their copyright work also in this statement.


Sincerely,

Webmaster@FurNation.com
http://www.FurNation.com


#####  COPYRIGHT AND USE NOTICE  #####
All original material (text, code, binaries, and/or attachments) contained
in this document are Copyright C 2004 FurNation Multimedia, All Rights
Reserved.  This material may not be displayed, copied, altered, archived,
distributed, transferred, or reproduced in any form, in part or in whole, in
public or in private, without written consent.  This material is intended
for the original recipient and purpose only.  Receipt and/or possession of
this material does not imply or infer any additional rights of use.



-- 
Outgoing mail is certified Virus Free.
Checked by AVG Anti-Virus (http://www.grisoft.com).
Version: 7.0.262 / Virus Database: 264.6.0 - Release Date: 8/11/2004

---
Processed by the FurNation Communication Server.
Website URL:  http://www.FurNation.com
